description.displayText:
Rocio was taking care of our 9 month old. Our girl was around 19 months old when we decided to move to a daycare instead and it was hard to say good by to Rocio! 
Our child really bonded with Rocio and it was wonderful to see them playing together, laughing, learning, running around. Rocio was dependable and responsible and we knew from the start that our child is in good hands. She is creative, fun and patient. She seems like a great teacher and was always warm and caring with our baby. We learned a lot from her also ;) She was out and about for walks and strolls every day, no matter the weather- we really like that!

description.displayText:
Rocio worked for us for the last 2 years, caring for my daughter since she was 1.5 and our son since birth. She is a very loving nanny who truly understands the importance of her role in helping our children develop and engage with the world. Rocio was great at supporting our daughter, encouraging and guiding with a calm, gentle manner.

Rocio is very active and creative and always comes up with activities and crafts. She can be relied on for activities, play dates, small errands, etc. and she is flexible with her hours and is generally able to stay late when asked.

We moved and unfortunately Rocio was unable to travel with us. We miss her calm and gentle presence in our home. Any family would be lucky to have her.
